headline: PANW Q1 Earnings Call: Next-Generation Security and AI Portfolio Drive Platformization Strategy
summary: Cybersecurity provider Palo Alto Networks (NASDAQ:PANW) missed Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, but sales rose 15.3% year on year to $2.29 billion. Its non-GAAP EPS of $0.80 per share was 3.6% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
